title: You Can't Divorce Your Kids
itunes:title: You Can't Divorce Your Kids
itunes:subtitle: This one goes out to all the parents, the wanna-be parents, the soon-to-be parents, and even the helicopter parents. You might want to sit down for this one, because it's time to unfu*k parenting!
description:
Gary's been on a roll through these last few episodes! You've heard his insights on authenticity, relationships, and family - but this one goes out to all the parents, the wanna-be parents, the soon-to-be parents, and even the helicopter parents. You might want to sit down for this one, because on this episode, Gary's set his sights on parenting, the ways we regard our own parents, and answering these questions from the nation:


  • While I’m working on myself, what can I do to unfuck my child from oversensitivity?
  • Is it fucked up to use my child's future as a motivating factor?
  • How can I have a relationship with my kid when they resent me for getting divorced?
  • How should I weigh my own happiness against the happiness of others, including my children?


All that and more is ahead on this episode of Unfuck Nation with Gary John Bishop!


Are You Ready to Unfu*k Yourself for Good?

  1. If you want to be the first to know when we drop new episodes, please take a moment to Follow or Subscribe to Unfuck Nation wherever you listen to your favorite Podcasts.
  2. If you have a question for Gary that you'd like featured on an upcoming episode, you can click here to email him directly or leave us a voicemail on the Unfuck Nation Hotline at (646) 450-3203.
  3. If you'd like to show your support for the show, we would greatly appreciate it if you would share the show with a friend or write a review for the show on Apple Podcasts.
  4. For more of Gary's content, you can click here to visit his website or you can connect with him on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
